dev-SBW-44.name: sitewards/bigpipe
dev-SBW-44.description: Implements a BigPipe option to Magento, so a block can be marked as BigPipe an will be rendered after the first flush appeared. Facebook uses that technique to avoid a blocking of the loading process by some slower components.

dev-master.name: sitewards/bigpipe
dev-master.description: Implements a BigPipe option to Magento, so a block can be marked as BigPipe an will be rendered after the first flush appeared. Facebook uses that technique to avoid a blocking of the loading process by some slower components.
